item.title: Winning Post 10 2025 demo launches March 13 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/winning-post-10-2025-demo-launches-march-13-in-japan

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Get an early start ahead of the game's March 27 release.

Koei Tecmo will release a demo for Winning Post 10 2025 for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on March 13 in Japan, the company announced.

The demo will allow you to play the entire first year of the game’s seven “Starting Year Scenarios,” and save data can be carried over to the full game when it launches. You will also receive one gold amulet and 500 million yen of in-game currency when you start. Horses can entered into races at all local racecourses, but spectating is only available at Oi Racecourse. Two of the Online Horse Championship races are also available to try, but data upload is not available.

Winning Post 10 2025 is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on March 27 in Japan.

item.title: ABYSS SEEKER: What Do You See Deep in The Abyss coming to PS4, Switch on March 6
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/abyss-seeker-what-do-you-see-deep-in-the-abyss-coming-to-ps4-switch-on-march-6

  • PS4
  • Switch

Currently available for PC.

SUCCESS Corporation will release PlayStation 4 and Switch versions of twin-stick survival shooter ABYSS SEEKER: What Do You See Deep in The Abyss on March 6 for $1.99 / £1.69 / €1.99, the company announced.

ABYSS SEEKER: What Do You See Deep in The Abyss first launched for PC via Steam and STOVE on December 5, 2024.

The Switch version of the game will feature some differences from the PlayStation 4 and PC versions. In order to resolve processing load issues, the “Plasma Beam” and “Zantetsu Protocol” Grimoires have been removed from the Switch version, and replaced with the “Rapid Laser” and “Magic Missile” Grimoires.

Here is an overview of the game, via SUCCESS Corporation:

ABYSS SEEKER: What Do You See Deep in The Abyss is a twin-stick survivor shooter where you freely control your character with two sticks. Survive against hordes of enemies within the time limit, defeat the boss appearing in the final wave, and advance to the next dungeon.

The shots fired by the player character can be customized by combining items that appear upon leveling up, transforming their properties. Create your own unique shots and defeat the relentless forces of darkness to survive!
